text: Leonard Robert Rosenbluth (January 22, 1933 â€“ June 18, 2022) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the National Basketball Association (NBA). He was born in New York City. Rosenbluth played for the Philadelphia Warriors between 1957 until 1959. Rosenbluth died on June 18, 2022 in Chapel Hill, North Carolina at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Lennie Rosenbluth
